DefaultEvent.Description:
$Isery -> イザリー$"Allow me to taste your memories," Isery says. "I've been conducting experiments in selective harvesting. We will use a single, specially-bred bee. Once I have tasted your memories, we will kill it (a decision which, I would like to establish, represents a notable loss of investment on my part). That will ensure your remaining memories are safe.

"I respect you too much to lie to you: the process will be blisteringly unpleasant. But it shouldn't be fatal. As long as you are resilient."

ChildBranches.Name: $Isery -> イザリー$Hear Isery's proposal
ChildBranches.Description: $lamplighter bee -> 灯点けミツバチ$"If I am to hitch my fortunes to yours, I need to know with utter surety who I am dealing with." A Melliferous Sister approaches. She carries a single lamplighter bee in a filigree cage.

DefaultEvent.Description: $Elder Continent -> 旧大陸, Isery -> イザリー$You reminisce about your association thus far, and the possibilities of your future alliance. Isery is eager to make themself useful to the Seven. "I'll begin gathering what information I can about Nidah and its environs. Travellers from the Elder Continent tend to be circumspect, but my bees won't care." Leaning close, Isery kisses your cheek with unmistakable warmth. "To immortality."

ChildBranches.Name: $Isery -> イザリー$Accept Isery's compliment and admit them into the Seven
ChildBranches.Description: $Isery -> イザリー$Isery's opinion of you is high. "You have proven yourself exemplary. I accept."

ChildBranches.Name: $Isery -> イザリー$Hear Isery's proposal
ChildBranches.Description: $lamplighter bee -> 灯点けミツバチ$"Our association thus far has been disappointing. If I'm to hitch my fortunes to yours, I need to know with utter surety who I am dealing with." A Melliferous Sister approaches. She carries a single lamplighter bee in a filigree cage.

Description:
$Isery -> イザリー$Isery is somewhat acquainted with Nidah and the Seven from the memories of the Well-Travelled Notary. You fill in the gaps, but leave enough unsaid to entice. Isery considers your offer carefully.

"I am intrigued, of course. And flattered. Who would not be? But the stakes are high, and the prey inconceivably dangerous. I am selective in my alliances, [q:Addressed As]." They lean back, considering you.
Name: $Isery -> イザリー$An Invitation for Isery
